com.hazelcast.cardinality.impl.hyperloglog.impl

Interface HyperLogLogEncoder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DataSerializable, IdentifiedDataSerializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DenseHyperLogLogEncoder, SparseHyperLogLogEncoder

    public interface HyperLogLogEncoder
extends IdentifiedDataSerializable

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean add(long hash)
      Aggregates the hash value in the HyperLogLog registers, and returns a hint if the operation might have affected the cardinality, it is just a hint, and it relies to the respective implementation.
      long estimate()
      Computes a new estimate for the current status of the registers.
      com.hazelcast.cardinality.impl.hyperloglog.impl.HyperLogLogEncoding getEncodingType()
      Returns the encoding type of this instance; see: HyperLogLogEncoding
      int getMemoryFootprint()
      Returns the size in memory occupied (in bytes) for this implementation of HyperLogLog.
      HyperLogLogEncoder merge(HyperLogLogEncoder encoder)
      Merge the two HyperLogLog structures in one.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.hazelcast.nio.serialization.IdentifiedDataSerializable

        getFactoryId, getId

      • Methods inherited from interface com.hazelcast.nio.serialization.DataSerializable

        readData, writeData

    • Method Detail

      • estimate

        long estimate()
        Computes a new estimate for the current status of the registers.
        Returns:
        a cardinality estimation.

      • add

        boolean add(long hash)
        Aggregates the hash value in the HyperLogLog registers, and returns a hint if the operation might have affected the cardinality, it is just a hint, and it relies to the respective implementation.
        Parameters:
        hash - the value to aggregate
        Returns:
        boolean hint, if the latest operation might have affected the cardinality.

      • getMemoryFootprint

        int getMemoryFootprint()
        Returns the size in memory occupied (in bytes) for this implementation of HyperLogLog.
        Returns:
        the size in memory.

      • getEncodingType

        com.hazelcast.cardinality.impl.hyperloglog.impl.HyperLogLogEncoding getEncodingType()
        Returns the encoding type of this instance; see: HyperLogLogEncoding
        Returns:
        HyperLogLogEncoding

      • merge

        HyperLogLogEncoder merge(HyperLogLogEncoder encoder)
        Merge the two HyperLogLog structures in one. Estimations from both are taken into consideration and the unified estimate should be similar to the distinct union set of the two.
        Parameters:
        encoder - The second HLL to be merged into this one
        Returns:
        HyperLogLogEncoder the union
